tool_description: Achieve stock price forecasting excellence with our API, powered by a robust Machine Learning algorithm and backed by 15 years of historical data. Developers gain unmatched confidence for precise predictions.
name: StockPred
title: StockPred

api_list.name: Get Today Data
api_list.description: This API method grants access to real-time data and information specifically for the current day. It enables users to obtain up-to-the-minute insights, track live market movements, and access data points relevant to the present day, supporting timely decision-making and analysis.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com/HistoricalData/TodayData/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com/HistoricalData/TodayData/{symbol}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get 10 Years of Historical Data
api_list.description: This API method grants access to a comprehensive 10-year historical dataset, enabling users to gather valuable insights, perform in-depth trend analysis, and conduct data-driven tasks that necessitate a decade's worth of historical information. This extensive dataset covers the past 120 months, providing a wealth of historical context and valuable data points for analysis and decision-making.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The symbol of the stock you want to retrieve historical data for. Provide the stock symbol (e.g., AAPL, AMZN, GOOGL) corresponding to the specific stock you are interested in. This parameter helps specify the target stock for which historical data will be retrieved.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com/HistoricalData/10YearsData/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Stock Predictions for the Next 90 Days
api_list.description: This endpoint allows you to request stock predictions for the next 90 days based on historical data. By providing the symbol parameter (e.g., AAPL, AMZN, etc.), you can access forecasts generated using a powerful machine learning algorithm trained on a decade's worth of historical stock data. The endpoint returns a comprehensive dataset that includes historical and predicted information for each day within the 7-day period. The data includes the following fields: Date, Open Price, Close Price, High Price, Low Price, Volume, and Adjusted Close Price. This feature empowers decision-making by providing a complete view of stock price trends for the specified symbol over the forecasted period
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com/Predictions/90DaysStocksPredictions/AAPL"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "stockpred1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get 1 Year of Historical Data
api_list.description: This API method provides access to historical data spanning a period of one year. This functionality facilitates the gathering of valuable insights, trend analysis, or any other data-driven tasks that require historical information covering the past 12 months.

required_parameters.name: symbol
required_parameters.description: The symbol of the stock you want to retrieve historical data for. Provide the stock symbol (e.g., AAPL, AMZN, GOOGL) corresponding to the specific stock you are interested in. This parameter helps specify the target stock for which historical data will be retrieved.
